details.fixedCode:
---
- hosts: webservers
  become: true
  tasks:
    - name: Install packages
      apt:
        name: nginx
        state: present
    
    - name: Configure database
      mysql_user:
        name: app_user
        password: "mypassword123"
        priv: '*.*:ALL'
    
    - shell: cat /etc/passwd
    
    - command: ls -la /root
    
    - name: Run custom script
      shell: ./deploy.sh
      ignore_errors: true
    
    - name: Copy config
      copy:
        src: config.yml
        dest: /etc/app/config.yml
        mode: '0644'
